comments:
Build ID: Build id: I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Associate the *.wsdl file extension with the WSDL editor.
2. Open a WSDL file.


More information:

The following exception is thrown:

java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.ui.ide.FileStoreEditorInput cannot be cast to org.eclipse.ui.IFileEditorInput

This was using the Open command from the File menu?

You should not need to associate the WSDL editor with the .wsdl extension. That is done under the hood by the WSDL content type.

This looks a lot like bug 144811 and its host of duplicates. The WSDL editor will only work when the wsdl file is located in a project in the workspace. Then there's also this regression in 2.0: bug 194935 when trying to open files from outside the workspace.

I'll mark as duplicate but feel free to reopen with more details if you do not concur.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 144811 ***
